remarks:
Membership in a Cartesian product requiring no quantifiers or dummy variables.  Provides a slightly shorter version of ~ elxp4 when the double intersection does not create class existence problems (caused by ~ int0 ).  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2004.) 

---

 Membership in a cross product requiring no quantifiers or dummy variables.  Provides a slightly shorter version of ~ elxp4 when the double intersection does not create class existence problems (caused by ~ int0 ).  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-2004.)
